description:
Special Announcement

Thank you for your support.

It's Elemental

Ludum Dare 38 Compo Entry - #34 in Innovation Category (Jam Theme: A Small World)

Welcome to the 56th edition of this wonderfully divine guidebook, “The Deific’s Guide to Creating, Exploiting and Destroying Pocket Worlds.”

Create worlds in order to generate new elements, exploit them, and then destroy them in order to make room for worlds that can generate even more complex elements.

This game was created for Ludum Dare 38. All assets in it, aside from the logo, were created within the 48 hour competition window. The game fared very well in judging, netting 34th place in Innovation out of over 1,800 entries. For more details, you can check out my submission on the Ludum Dare site.

Ludum Dare 38 rankings for this game:

  • Innovation 4.053 (34th)
  • Theme 3.789 (120th)
  • Audio 3.243 (161st)
  • Humor 2.972 (169th)
  • Mood 3.162 (251st)
  • Graphics 3.026 (331st)
  • Overall 3.158 (334th)
  • Fun 2.553 (469th)

As this is a legacy project that has not been updated in some time, it is provided without warranty.
